name: Kingdom Coins Lucky Vegas - Dozer of Coins Arcade Game
name_original: Kingdom Coins Lucky Vegas - Dozer of Coins Arcade Game
description:
Are you feeling lucky? Step into the ultimate Las Vegas gaming experience and test your dozer skills on poker chips.

Kingdom Coins is a beautiful and fun arcade coin pusher game for your Mac!

Download this FREE game now to start playing!

What people are saying about the Kingdom Coins games:

- "Super nice music with fabulous gaming experience. I love it." - M Kevin

- "Same enjoyment factor as the Dozers! These games are very addicting. Im a mom with 2 kids and catch myself sneaking away to play, lol!" - Tiffany Batzel

- "I really like the pace of this game...it's quick and really easy to play. I love playing coin dozer games- and I'm happy about this new addition to the game apps! Keep them coming!" - kari martinez

Join the Vegas adventure right on the strip by dropping the gold coins and pushing them to your new high score! You'll see fun prizes drop down that unlock special bonuses for your great game play. Diamonds, cars, gold watches, and even bottles of champagne will unlock bonus prizes and more free giveaways!

Be careful not to push the coins and prizes off the side...they won't count! Giant coins drop and coin walls come up to give you a big boost to help though. If you run out of coins, that's ok! You can wait for more and keep playing!

Join the fun with these great features:

- Beautiful 3D graphics straight out of Las Vegas
- Amazing physics and realistic movements
- Over 90 Vegas themed prizes to win!
- Fun sound effects
- Hundreds of levels
- Special bonuses you'll have to see to believe!
